alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 2:54AM MST until January 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches along the Highway 89 corridor including Panguitch, and 3 to 6 inches in Bryce Canyon. * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected across the area including Highways 12 and 89. For those planning to outdoor recreation prepare for cold and snowy conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys
